Tooltip: Workflow class to convert a into an HTML table string representation.

Arguments.Name: in_dt_Table
Arguments.Tooltip: The datatable to convert to HTML.

Arguments.Name: in_options_DataTableToHTML
Arguments.Tooltip: Formatting and serialization options for customizing the HTML output. If null, default formatting is used.

Arguments.Name: Output
Arguments.Tooltip: An HTML string representation of the contents of the DataTable.
